data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Northern Areas, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Northern Areas, Northern Areas, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 2,074 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Northern Areas
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 744,000 citizens of Northern Areas, Northern Areas, Pakistan, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Bashkar people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Lord, make the 2,074 believers in Northern Areas to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 741,925 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Northern Areas, Northern Areas, Pakistan humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 2,074 believers in Northern Areas to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

location.name: Northern Areas
location.people_groups_list: Bodh (Buddhist traditions), Mirzakhani, Burusho, Pashtun Dilazak, Changpa
